entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
